item.title: Street Light Out for the Forth Time, 6th July
item.description:
This is now the forth time this has not been working. Was repaired again recently but now not working again

item.title: Drug use - Cannabis smell, 6th July
item.description:
At this property (8 Clockwork Mews) the tenants smoke cannabis multiple times per day, all day. Persistent smell. Present for over 18 months
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clifden Road, Hackney, London

item.title: The tree outside 32 Broadlands Road is exhibiting characteristics of a dying tree, such as leaning, lack of foliage on 1/3rd of the tree, 6th July
item.description:
The tree outside 32 Broadlands Road is exhibiting characteristics of a dying tree, such as leaning, lack of foliage on 1/3rd of the tree, the bark is falling off on many of the branches and part of the trunk, the branches are brittle - we often see sticks on the ground that have fallen off. Given the history of tree falls on Broadlands Road(three trees) and the visible deterioration of the tree outside 32 Broadlands Road we strongly believe this needs to be investigated.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broadlands Road, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
